description:
Language spoken in the household as recorded during the 2010 Census, divided by PUMA (public use microdata area). More info on PUMA can be found here: https://www.census.gov/geo/reference/puma.html 

Data was acquired from Lehman College Geography Department faculty

name: Bronx 2010 PUMA Language By Houshold
